title: Popilush Long Sleeve Midi Dress Bodycon Party Dress Shapewear Tummy Control Cocktail Dresses Built-in Bra
description: Size Tips: Please refer to the size chart to ensure an accurate fit. Measure your waist, bust, and hips to find your size. If you are between sizes, please choose a larger size. Shapewear may seem small and tight, so be patient when putting it on

Design Details: This shapewear dress's square neckline and midi length showcase your collarbones and visually elongate your figure, ensuring you stand out in any crowd. The long sleeves offer warmth during fall and winter while highlighting your arm lines

Built-In Shapewear: The bodycon dress with built-in shapewear offers all-day comfort. The double-layer fabric provides tummy control and a lift for your hip. It features removable bust pads and an overlapping crotch design for ease of daily life

Exclusive Fabric Technology: Our cocktail dress features a fabric blend of 94% modal and 6% spandex, utilizing exclusive technology for a four-way stretch. It's lightweight, breathable, and ultra-soft, providing you with an exceptional wearing experience

Suit for Any Occasion: Our long sleeve dress is suitable for day or night outings, cocktail parties, clubs, birthdays, dates, and casual wear. Pair it with a necklace, high heels, a jacket, or a bag, you will stand out
